home.notes: LCP optimized with CSS gradient hero. DoctorCard image has priority. Lazy loading used effectively.

location.notes: Static generation used. Map component uses facade pattern.

appointment.notes: AppointmentScheduler renders empty slots initially, causing layout shift (CLS) when slots load via useEffect.

bottleneck_identified.description: AppointmentScheduler initializes `slots` state as empty `[]`, causing a 'No slots available' message or empty grid to render first, followed by the actual slots after hydration/effect. This causes a layout shift.

fix_implemented.description: Refactored `AppointmentScheduler` to derive `slots` synchronously using `useMemo` instead of `useState` + `useEffect`.
fix_implemented.expected_impact: Eliminates the initial 'empty' state render. The slots grid will be populated immediately during the first render pass, preventing the layout shift and flash of incorrect content.
fix_implemented.verification: Code review confirms synchronous derivation. Manual verification would show the grid appearing instantly.
